meanings.definition: Already tuned or adjusted in advance.
meanings.sent1: The preattuned guitar sounded perfect without any further adjustments.
meanings.sent2: The preattuned radio station made it easy to find my favorite music.
meanings.sent3: The preattuned puzzle was so easy, I finished it in minutes!
meanings.sent4: Her preattuned intuition warned her of the impending danger.
meanings.sent5: The preattuned alarm system detected the slightest movement in the house.

meanings.definition: To have been tuned or adjusted in advance.
meanings.sent1: He preattuned the piano before the concert to ensure it sounded perfect.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic preattuned the engine, so the car ran smoothly.
meanings.sent3: She preattuned her schedule to fit in all her appointments for the day.
meanings.sent4: The chef preattuned the flavors of the dish to create a harmonious blend.
meanings.sent5: The artist preattuned the colors of the painting to evoke a sense of calm.
